Filter out messed up videos (contain less frames)
```{r}
data %<>% 
  filter(!(video %in% c("XS_1612", "XS_1614", "XS_1631", "XS_1635")))
```

```{r}
result <- data %>%
  rbind(new_frames) %>%
  arrange(video, frame)
```
